59  explicit plProbTable(const plVariablesConjunction& V, bool random_prob_values=false);

87  template<typename T>
88  plProbTable( const plVariablesConjunction& V, const T *values,
89  bool is_already_normalized = false )
90  : plDistribution(V, PLProbTable)
91  {
92  unsigned int n_elems = static_cast<unsigned int>(V.cardinality());
93  set(V,
94  values, values+n_elems,
95  is_already_normalized);
96  }
97  plProbTable( const plVariablesConjunction& V, const double *values,
98  bool is_already_normalized = false )
99  : plDistribution(V, PLProbTable)
100  {
101  unsigned int n_elems = static_cast<unsigned int>(V.cardinality());
102  set(V,
103  values, values+n_elems,
104  is_already_normalized);
105  }
106  plProbTable( const plVariablesConjunction& V, const float *values,
107  bool is_already_normalized = false )
108  : plDistribution(V, PLProbTable)
109  {
110  unsigned int n_elems = static_cast<unsigned int>(V.cardinality());
111  set(V,
112  values, values+n_elems,
113  is_already_normalized);
114  }

121  template<typename T>
122  plProbTable( const plVariablesConjunction& V, const std::vector<T> &values,
123  bool is_already_normalized = false)
124  : plDistribution(V, PLProbTable)
125  {
126  set(V,
127  values.begin(), values.end(),
128  is_already_normalized);
129  }

135  values.begin(), values.end(),
136  is_already_normalized);
137  }

153  Titerator begin,
